setScorerClass

void setScorerClass(java.lang.String className)
This sets the scoring model for the concept based retrieval.

Parameters:
className - The name of the IScorer class that implements the concept based retrieval model.

setScorerClass

void setScorerClass(java.lang.Class<? extends IScorer> scorerClass)
This sets the scoring model for the concept based retrieval.

Parameters:
scorerClass - The scorer class that implements IScorer interface.

match

void match(IConceptVector queryCV)
This function performs a complete retrieval step for a specified query which is represented by a concept vector.

Parameters:
queryCV - The concept vector of the query that should be searched for.

getMatches

java.util.List<edu.kit.aifb.ir.IMatch> getMatches()
This function returns a sorted list of matches found for a previous call of match().

Returns:
A sorted list of matches containing relevant documents and their scores.
